headline: PG&E to Lower Electric Prices on Jan. 1, Fourth Decrease in Two Years
summary: Pacific Gas and Electric Company (PG&E) will cut electric rates for the fourth time in two years on January 1, 2026. Natural gas rates also are going down.

headline: Wall Street Mixed on PG&E Corporation (PCG) as Growth Opportunities Emerge for 2026
summary: PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG) is among the ridiculously cheap stocks to buy now. As of December 26, PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG) has a ‘Buy’ or equivalent rating from 78% of the analysts covering the stock. With a median price target of $21, the stock has an upside potential of 33.16%. Among the analysts bullish on the stock […]
